page.title: 12Leisure in Combwich.
page.content: The social activities which take place in this area are centred on Combwich and to a lesser extent Stockland.There is a toddlers club, playgroup, Brownies,Guides,Judo and a 5_11year church club.Combwich social club is based on the village Hall which also provided a venue for Bingo, Skittles, Pool,Discos and the Shamrock club(Pensioners)There are two pubs, both of which do meals,one has a ladies skittles team and a Fives court.There is a small Yacht Club and a women's Institute.The baby Clinic is once a month and the doctors surgery once a week.Stockland has a flower show and a Gymkhana and Combwich has a Flower Show.Other activities in the area include gardening,pheasant and clay pigeon shooting,fishing,riding sailing and water sports.
